short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created to test some features for Brighton Web Design Agency bonitech.co.uk

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BONI Technology is a Brighton web design company specializing in WordPress web design and development, Android and IOS Application Development, Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) and Social Media Marketing (SMM).
